primevc.gui.managers.ISystem

type
interface
Collection of manager classes.

Instance Variables

invalidation(default,null) : InvalidationManager

Invalidation manager. Invalidated objects will be validated on the next 'enterFrame' event.

popups(getPopupManager,null) : IPopupManager

Popup manager. IUIElements that are added to the popupmanager will stay on top of the normal content.

rendering(default,null) : RenderManager

Render manager. Invalidated rendering objects will be validated when the FlashPlayer fires a RenderEvent.

toolTip(default,null) : ToolTipManager

Tooltip manager
